title: Hide login icon while keeping authentication functional

requirements.summary: Hide the login icon/button from the SiteHeader component while preserving all Internet Identity authentication functionality in the background
acceptanceCriteria: The LoginButton component is not visible in the site header
Internet Identity authentication continues to work in the background
Admin functionality remains accessible for authenticated admin users
No authentication-related errors occur from hiding the UI element

file_operations.description: Remove the LoginButton component from the header's visual rendering by commenting out or conditionally hiding the <LoginButton /> JSX element. Keep all authentication hooks (useInternetIdentity, useIsCallerAdmin) and state management intact. Preserve the conditional admin link logic that depends on isAuthenticated and isAdmin states. The authentication system will continue functioning in the background through the existing hooks, allowing admin users to access admin routes while the login UI remains hidden from all users.
